# purchase()

**Instance Method**

Initiates a purchase action for the product.

## Declaration

```swift
func purchase()
```

## Discussion

Use this method instead of calling [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/purchase(options:)]directly on the product.
